title: Nat "King" Cole plus the Mills Brothers and Delta Rhythm Boys, 1943-1951
brief_description: Using archival resources which have been digitally restored, this video presented by Cab Calloway features a wonderful selection of jazz greats performed by the unique voice of the charming and memorable Nat “King” Cole, along with the Mills Brothers and the Delta Rhythm Boys and supported by Dorothy Dandridge, the Joey Adams Orchestra, Irving Ashby, Joe Comfort and Jack Costanza. NB: Fluctuating sound and picture quality.
